title: "Error Connecting To Server"
body: After champ select the screen just goes black and say "Error Connecting To Server". It worked fine last night after I added the league ports to my firewall to let me play, but today the last two games I attempted have resulted in this error giving my team a afk player. May I ask for the current ports that league uses(If I missed any) or any troubleshooting tips that would help this issue.

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like there may be a local network setting that could be preventing you from reaching the servers properly. I suggest working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step in resolving this. We've consolidated the most common solutions in that guide, and it shouldn't take long to work through the list of steps.

Let me know if you were able to resolve the issue with those steps.
